CustomField.formula: AND(Account.NSS_WorkableHRS__c ,OwnerId != $Label.ReferralOwnerName ,Sales_Contact__c=true ,DoNotCall=false ,ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c ,"Disqualified")=false ,ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c,'Bank Referral') = false ,DuplicatePhone_HRS__c = false ,Owner.Alias != "rown" ,NOT(Account.AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ,NOT(ISPICKVAL( Hold_Out_Reason__c , 'Paychex Referral Network')) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is this workable by the HRS group NSS?
CustomField.label: NSS Workable-HRS
